# Tender Announcement

**Title:** Supply and Installation of a Hydraulic Metal Shear
**Reference:** WS4033271775-Doc4061728662
**Solicitation Number:** WS4033271775

## Contract Information

* **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Status:** Expired (Closed)
* **Publication Date:** 19 June 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 02 August 2023 (14:00 hours)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2024

## RFP Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) as the Contracting Entity, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites proposals for the supply and installation of a Hydraulic Metal Shear.

To obtain more information, please see the RFP document at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16626075](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16626075). Bidders are advised to review the RFP document carefully before submitting their proposals. The submission deadline is 02 August 2023 (14:00 hours). 

**Note:** Please direct any questions to Denton, Crystal
